description: If cloud.get_metadata throws an exception, we don't log the error in nova-api.  This makes debugging issues much more difficult
title: When metadata fails, we eat the exception and don't return a useful message

comments.content: If cloud.get_metadata throws an exception, we don't log the error in nova-api.  This makes debugging issues much more difficult
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
